sendRoomLink: Send the room link to your friend to start the game
forEveryFren: For every new friend you will receive
tapReadyToStart: Tap Ready to start the game
gameWillBeLost: If you leave now - game will be lost.
roomBusy: Room is already busy. Create your own to start playing
pointsForInviting: points for a friend joining Durak via your link!
opponentLeft: Your opponent has left the game
exploreGroup: Explore other players who are looking for a game in our Telegram group
watchRules: Watch 5 min video explaining durak rules

points.aboutPointsText: Airdrop is coming and your points will be converted into the $DRK token. The more points you earn - the highest will be reward.
points.howToEarn1: Play with your friends. For every win you get {{winPoints}} points and for every game you get {{gamePoints}} points.
points.howToEarn2: Invite more friends. For every invite you get {{invitePoints}} points.
